scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 From: <tel:[field0]>;tag=[call_number] To: <tel:[field1]> Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [field2]:[field3];rport;branch=[branch] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:[field0]@[field2]:[field3] Route: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip];lr;term>,<sip:[field2]:[remote_port];lr;OdiPsi=[field0]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 101 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000

ACK sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [field2]:[field3];rport;branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:[field0]@[field2]:[field3]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:[field0]@[field2]:[field3] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:[field2]:[field3];transport=[transport]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:[field2]:[field3];transport=[transport]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

BYE sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [field2]:[field3];rport;branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:[field0]@[field2]:[field3]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:[field0]@[field2]:[field3] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
